item.title: Grafana Loki
item.description: Loki is a Prometheus-inspired logging service for cloud native infrastructure. Itâ€™s similar to well-known ELK stack but more simple use and is intended to be used mostly Kubernetes.

item.title: Install Nemon with Influxdb storage
item.description: I prefer to use Naemon (a fork of nagos) with Influxdb as a storage for graphical data.
